text:
Thank you so much <@U25C65C3S>. Can you suggest any work around for this?
What I was thinking that maybe I could somehow manage to get authentication token for member, i.e <https://example.com/_hcms/mem/verify/{authentication-token}>
And then redirect from the signup page or load in some iframe the page for setting password.
But I don't see any api to fetch this token, can you guide me that where this token is saved and how to get it?
Or may be there is some api for updating password of member, (which I couldn't find in documentation)

It is not possible, HubSpot doesn't surface that token.

(They should) but they don't
